_header: Renowned royal right reverend and serene
Title(s): ‘Welcum to Bernard Stewart, Lord of Aubigny, May, 1508’
Subjects: acrostics; occasional verse; historical poems; Steward, Bernard, lord of Aubigny
_description: William Dunbar, ‘Welcum to Bernard Stewart, Lord of Aubigny, May, 1508’ — twelve 8-line stanzas (including acrostic on Barnardus) with refrain, ‘With glorie and honoure lawde and reuerence’
